## NYC data

```{r, message=FALSE}

FTA_df <- function(file_name, sheet_number, range) {
  df <- read_xlsx(file_name, sheet=sheet_number, range=range, col_names=TRUE) 
  
  df <- df %>% 
  filter(`Reporter Type` == "Full Reporter") %>% 
  filter(Active == "Active") %>% 
  gather(key = "Date", value = "")
  
  
    
  return(df)
}
```
